title: Bump the skiasharp group with 9 updates
body:
Bumps the skiasharp group with 9 updates: | Package | From | To | | --- | --- | --- | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Skottie](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [HarfBuzzSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `7.3.0` | `7.3.0.1` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.6` | `2.88.7` | Updates `SkiaSharp` from 2.88.6 to 2.88.7
Release notes

Sourced from SkiaSharp's releases.

Version 2.88.7

What's Changed

  • Install missing Tizen packages after image update by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2693
  • Add the new APIScan to the pipeline by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2694
  • Only run the full compliance nightly by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2701
  • [release/2.x] Revert the libjpeg-turbo update and roll back to 2.1.5.1 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2702

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/compare/v2.88.6...v2.88.7

Commits
  • 8c7324d Update version to stable
  • 4adf59c Revert "[release/2.x] Update libjpeg-turbo to 3.0.0 (#2581)" (#2702)
  • 7506fe6 Only run the full compliance nightly (#2701)
  • bef60ae Add the new APIScan to the pipeline (#2694)
  • 1c36d90 Install missing Tizen packages after image update (#2693)
  • 9cfbdf8 Bump the SkiaSharp versions
  • See full diff in compare view
